channel.title: Bold Font - Need Help!
channel.description:
Found this kind of text on many 525+ servers.
[img]http://i1189.photobucket.com/albums/z426/GoCosmoGo/bold.png[/img] How can we put this style on a 317?
I thought it would be something similar to strikethrough, but after I looked at how it works I gave up.
Code for strikethrough (I think): [code] if(aBoolean1499) Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method339(k + (int)((double)anInt1497 * 0.69999999999999996D), 0x800000, i - l, l, (byte)4); [/code]
If you know ANYTHING about the drawtext methods I would be interested.

item.title: Bold Font - Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

whackatre:

Yes, that is what I mean.

The fastest way would be to render the text one pixel to the right, and one pixel down with the same text. However this doesn’t really give you any flexibility.

Read full topic

item.title: Bold Font - Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Yes, that is what I mean.

item.title: Bold Font - Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:1, topic:417080”]Found this kind of text on many 525+ servers.


How can we put this style on a 317?

I thought it would be something similar to strikethrough, but after I looked at how it works I gave up.

Code for strikethrough (I think):

        if(aBoolean1499)
            Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method339(k + (int)((double)anInt1497 * 0.69999999999999996D), 0x800000, i - l, l, (byte)4);

If you know ANYTHING about the drawtext methods I would be interested.[/quote]

It’s not bold. It’s the default font, with text rendered in a different color, to give the illusion of a shadow.

Read full topic
